entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
